title: The name is Emmy Lou Sue. The little "brat"
description: Emmy Lou Sue, the little "brat" gets herself into all kinds of trouble when she decided to run away from home. Over 50 pages of fun pictures and rhymes for the little ones. Follow Emmy Lou Sue and her best friend Chilli as they find themselves lost and far from home. Some of the animals they meet are not so nice. Others may be helpful. Can Emmy and Chilli find home again.
author: B.M. Killaire
